header.title: Get Involved
header.description: Giving the gift of coding not only impacts the lives of the students involved, it has the potential to change the world.

paragraphs.title: Donate
paragraphs: $x ensures 30 kids learn how to code.

The Coding School is a 501c3 organization. Your gift is tax deductible to the extent allowed by the law. When you make a donation through PayPal, you will automatically receive a receipt that can be used for tax deduction purposes.  Our public charity number is 46-5097610.

paragraphs.title: Partner With Us
paragraphs: Partnerships are essential to maximizing the impact our program can have. If you or your company is interested in learning more, please contact us.
In addition, The Coding School is proud to have been awarded the Brown Venture Launch Fund from Brown University Social Innovation Initiative.

paragraphs.title: Bring Coding to Your School
paragraphs: If you are interested in bringing coding education to your students, please contact us.

paragraphs.title: Volunteer
paragraphs: We are always looking for passionate coders to join our teaching team, as well as non-coders to help run and expand our programs. If you're interested, contact us!
